title: EnzymeMLDocument
description: This is the root object that composes all objects found in an EnzymeML document. It also includes general metadata such as the name of the document, when it was created/modified, and references to publications, databases, and arbitrary links to the web.

complexes.title: complexes
complexes.description: Contains all complexes that are part of the experiment.

created.title: created
created.description: Date the EnzymeML document was created.

creators.title: creators
creators.description: Contains all authors that are part of the experiment.

equations.title: equations
equations.description: Contains ordinary differential equations that describe the kinetic model.

measurements.title: measurements
measurements.description: Contains measurements that describe outcomes of an experiment.

modified.title: modified
modified.description: Date the EnzymeML document was modified.

parameters.title: parameters
parameters.description: List of parameters that are part of the equation

proteins.title: proteins
proteins.description: Contains all proteins that are part of the experiment.

reactions.title: reactions
reactions.description: Dictionary mapping from reaction IDs to reaction-describing objects.

references.title: references
references.description: Contains references to publications, databases, and arbitrary links to the web.

small_molecules.title: small_molecules
small_molecules.description: Contains all reactants that are part of the experiment.

vessels.title: vessels
vessels.description: Contains all vessels that are part of the experiment.

BaseUnit.title: BaseUnit
BaseUnit.description: Represents a base unit in the unit definition.

exponent.title: exponent
exponent.description: Exponent of the base unit in the unit definition.

kind.title: kind
kind.description: Kind of the base unit (e.g., meter, kilogram, second).

multiplier.title: multiplier
multiplier.description: Multiplier of the base unit in the unit definition.

scale.title: scale
scale.description: Scale of the base unit in the unit definition.

Complex.title: Complex
Complex.description: This object describes complexes made of reactants and/or proteins that were used or produced in the course of the experiment.

participants.title: participants
participants.description: Array of IDs the complex contains

vessel_id.title: vessel_id
vessel_id.description: Unique identifier of the vessel this complex has been used in.

Creator.title: Creator
Creator.description: The creator object contains all information about authors that contributed to the resulting document.

family_name.title: family_name
family_name.description: Family name of the author or contributor.

given_name.title: given_name
given_name.description: Given name of the author or contributor.

mail.title: mail
mail.description: Email address of the author or contributor.

Equation.title: Equation
Equation.description: This object describes an equation that can be used to model the kinetics of a reaction. There are different types of equations that can be used to model the kinetics of a reaction. The equation can be an ordinary differential equation, a rate law or assignment rule.

species_id.title: species_id
species_id.description: Internal identifier to a species defined in the EnzymeMLDocument, given it is a rate equation.

variables.title: variables
variables.description: List of variables that are part of the equation

Measurement.title: Measurement
Measurement.description: This object describes the result of a measurement, which includes time course data of any type defined in DataTypes. It includes initial concentrations of all species used in a single measurement.

group_id.title: group_id
group_id.description: User-defined group ID to signal relationships between measurements.

species_data.title: species_data
species_data.description: Measurement data of all species that were part of the measurement. A species can refer to a protein, complex, or small molecule.

temperature_unit.title: temperature_unit
temperature_unit.description: Unit of the temperature of the measurement.

MeasurementData.title: MeasurementData
MeasurementData.description: This object describes a single entity of a measurement, which corresponds to one species. It also holds replicates that contain time course data.

data_type.title: data_type
data_type.description: Type of data that was measured (e.g. concentration)

data_unit.title: data_unit
data_unit.description: SI unit of the data that was measured.

initial.title: initial
initial.description: Initial amount of the measurement data. This must be the same as the first data point in the

is_simulated.title: is_simulated
is_simulated.description: Whether or not the data has been generated by simulation.

prepared.title: prepared
prepared.description: Amount of the reactant before the measurement. This field should be used for specifying the prepared amount of a species in the reaction mix. Not to be confused with

species_id.title: species_id
species_id.description: The identifier for the described reactant.

Parameter.title: Parameter
Parameter.description: This object describes the parameters of the kinetic model and can include all estimated values.

constant.title: constant
constant.description: Specifies if this parameter is constant

initial_value.title: initial_value
initial_value.description: Initial value that was used for the parameter estimation.

lower.title: lower
lower.description: Lower bound of the estimated parameter.

stderr.title: stderr
stderr.description: Standard error of the estimated parameter.

upper.title: upper
upper.description: Upper bound of the estimated parameter.

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the estimated parameter.

Protein.title: Protein
Protein.description: This object describes the proteins that were used or formed throughout the experiment.

id.title: id
id.description: Unique internal identifier of the protein.

organism.title: organism
organism.description: Organism the protein was expressed in.

organism_tax_id.title: organism_tax_id
organism_tax_id.description: Taxonomy identifier of the expression host.

references.title: references
references.description: Array of references to publications, database entries, etc. that describe the protein.

sequence.title: sequence
sequence.description: Amino acid sequence of the protein

vessel_id.title: vessel_id
vessel_id.description: Unique identifier of the vessel this protein has been used in.

Reaction.title: Reaction
Reaction.description: This object describes a chemical or enzymatic reaction that was investigated in the course of the experiment. All species used within this object need to be part of the data model.

modifiers.title: modifiers
modifiers.description: List of reaction elements that are not part of the reaction but influence it.

reversible.title: reversible
reversible.description: Whether the reaction is reversible or irreversible

species.title: species
species.description: List of reaction elements that are part of the reaction.

ReactionElement.title: ReactionElement
ReactionElement.description: This object is part of the Reaction object and describes either an educt, product or modifier. The latter includes buffers, counter-ions as well as proteins/enzymes.

species_id.title: species_id
species_id.description: Internal identifier to either a protein or reactant defined in the EnzymeMLDocument.

stoichiometry.title: stoichiometry
stoichiometry.description: Float number representing the associated stoichiometry.

SmallMolecule.title: SmallMolecule
SmallMolecule.description: This object describes the reactants that were used or produced in the course of the experiment.

canonical_smiles.title: canonical_smiles
canonical_smiles.description: Canonical Simplified Molecular-Input Line-Entry System (SMILES) encoding of the reactant.

id.title: id
id.description: Unique identifier of the small molecule.

inchi.title: inchi
inchi.description: International Chemical Identifier (InChI) encoding of the reactant.

inchikey.title: inchikey
inchikey.description: Hashed International Chemical Identifier (InChIKey) encoding of the reactant.

references.title: references
references.description: Array of references to publications, database entries, etc. that describe the reactant.

vessel_id.title: vessel_id
vessel_id.description: Unique identifier of the vessel this small molecule has been used in.

UnitDefinition.title: UnitDefinition
UnitDefinition.description: Represents a unit definition that is based on the SI unit system.

base_units.title: base_units
base_units.description: Base units that define the unit.

id.title: id
id.description: Unique identifier of the unit definition.

name.title: name
name.description: Common name of the unit definition.

Variable.title: Variable
Variable.description: This object describes a variable that is part of an equation.

Vessel.title: Vessel
Vessel.description: This object describes vessels in which the experiment has been carried out. These can include any type of vessel used in biocatalytic experiments.

constant.title: constant
constant.description: Whether the volume of the vessel is constant or not.
